thread.title: Suite Pass of Austin Curates Exclusive Grand Prix Experiences
thread.title_full: Suite Pass of Austin Curates Exclusive Grand Prix Experiences

author: Suite Pass
title: Suite Pass of Austin Curates Exclusive Grand Prix Experiences
text: Suite Pass of Austin Curates Exclusive Grand Prix Experiences High-end portfolio of race weekend events includes chauffeured Lamborghini service and private race day suites. Austin, TX, October 13, 2015 --( PR.com )-- In less than two weeks time, the Formula 1 United States Grand Prix returns to the Circuit of the Americas, October 23-25, 2015. For discerning guests in search of the ultimate race weekend, Suite Pass holds the keys to a superior motorsports experience.Austin is well-known as a favorite destination on the F1 calendar for both fans and drivers alike. Attendees enjoy the fabulous cars racing around the Circuit of the Americas (COTA) during the day, and are immersed in a steamy party environment at night. Clients of Suite Pass can opt to get from Austin’s heliports to COTA via helicopter shuttle or chauffeured exotic car.The $400-million+ purpose-built race track is complete with helipads, a three-story paddock building, glass-bottomed observation tower, and hospitality suites and open-air race viewing. Suite Pass offers a variety of race-day venues with breakfast and lunch, views of the most exciting turns of the circuit, and a comfortable environment for mingling and making connections. Hospitality options range from $1,799 to $7,800 per person. Corporate bookings available.Post-race, those in the mood to party head to downtown Austin, where the atmosphere is absolutely buzzing with street parties and concerts. For those seeking a more exclusive experience, there are a selection of “pop-up” Grand Prix clubs - the most discerning are only available by advance reservations or invitation, and are attended by both celebrities and F1 drivers. Of note is Blu + My Yacht Club, which stages the dazzling Full Tilt Fashion Show in advance of a DJ-centric private club. These parties are available to Suite Pass guests, for both individual or table service reservations. Table pricing with dedicated wait staff runs from $5,000 to $14,500.“Since the inaugural F1 race, Suite Pass has worked to secure the most interesting and exclusive Grand Prix experiences available in Austin,” stated Danielle Crespo, Founder of Suite Pass and Austin Race Events. “With a portfolio of experiences spanning chauffeured Lamborghini service, helicopter shuttles, F1 team hospitality, off-market hotel suites and pop-up nightclub bookings, it’s a testament to the fact that personal connections directly benefit guests of Suite Pass.”Final bookings for all of the above can be found at www.suitepass.com . Event updates are made via Facebook: facebook.com/AustinRaceEvents and Twitter: twitter.com/AustinSuitePass. To learn more about Suite Pass, contact Danielle Crespo, danielle@suitepass.com.About Suite Pass, LLCSuite Pass, LLC caters to motorsport and hospitality professionals as well as fans of high-end motorsports events such as Formula 1 in Austin, Monaco, and Mexico. A thorough selection of upcoming racing events in Austin, Texas, event and racing tickets, luxury transportation, suite packages, and exclusive weekend experiences can be found at suitepass.com. Suite Pass is also an official agent for top events like Amber Lounge, Blu, and APEX nights.Contact: Danielle Crespo, danielle@suitepass.com
